name: Ethereal (itch) (RoDoe)
description:
☁︎ Story ☁︎ 

⋆｡ﾟ☁︎｡⋆｡ ﾟ☾ ﾟ｡⋆

⋆｡ﾟ☁︎｡⋆｡ ﾟ☾ ﾟ｡⋆ Who are you? Where do you come from? ⋆｡ﾟ☁︎｡⋆｡ ﾟ☾ ﾟ｡⋆

You wake up in the back of a cart during one of the coldest days of Winter. You don't know who you are or anyone around you. 

But there's something... Ethereal...

Triggering things are in this game. Please don't play this game if you're sensitive to gore, depictions of death, and glitching text.Remember, your choices have consequences. 

⋆｡ﾟ☁︎｡⋆｡ ﾟ☾ ﾟ｡⋆

☁︎ Features ☁︎ 

⋆｡ﾟ☁︎｡⋆｡ ﾟ☾ ﾟ｡⋆

- Customizable MC (Name, Pronouns, Etc)

- 5 Love interests to choose from (Homosexual, Heterosexual, and Pansexual/Bisexual options)

- Strong language 

- Possible 18+ option

- 20 Chapter goal

- Possible language options (Spanish(Español), Russian(Pусский), French(Français), Etc)

- Possible sound added

⋆｡ﾟ☁︎｡⋆｡ ﾟ☾ ﾟ｡⋆

☁︎Love Options☁︎

⋆｡ﾟ☁︎｡⋆｡ ﾟ☾ ﾟ｡⋆

Rolland (He/Him/His) - A half-serpent, half-merfolk from a desert kingdom who's alignment is Chaotic Neutral. He seems not to give two shits for anyone around him but he seems slightly relaxed around you.

Zinr(He/Him/His) - A human, you think? You don't know much about him but he seems kind. He doesn't talk about himself much but you think you can get him to.

Raen(They/Them/Theirs) - A stryx from some far off island, they don't seem to know much about the new world around them, like you. They are excited about everything happening, do you follow them?

Lawrence(She/Her/Hers) - A witch from the town Waetyn, the town you arrive in. She is snarky but caring, do you know her? She seems like she knows who you are.

Autumn(She/Her/Hers) - A human from Ruinith. She is on a trip at Waetyn for something, what is it?

Everything is still in it's beginning stages. Things are still being tested on the creator side but it's now open for the public to test it before we officially launch the demo
